title: #250 - Doug Stanhope & ME
description:
Comedian Doug Stanhope and I hang out in Denver for a Swap cast with his entire Bisbee crew (Greg Chaille, Chad Shank, Andy Andrist) and the owner of the Denver Comedy Works, Wende Curtis.  We sit by her pool, drink Vodka, and talk about the Sober Challenge I am doing with Joe Rogan, Ari Shaffir, and Tom Segura, how he wants in, how much we currently drink, what drugs we are scared of, and what comics rode the road too hard.

To get my book "Life of the Party" click HERE: https://www.amazon.com/Life-Party-Stories-Perpetual-Man-Child/dp/1250030250

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

 

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer

This Podcast is brought to you by DraftKings...go to Https://www.draftkings.com and use the promo code BERTCAST to play this week with a chance to win ONE BILLION DOLLARS!!!

This podcast is also brought to you by Bombfell. Bombfell is offering my listeners $25 off your first purchase when you visit bombfell.com/bertcast. That’s  B-O-M-B-F-E-L-L dot com, slash bertcast for $25 off. “Bombfell. Open and Clothes.” 

This Podcast is brought to you by ZipRecruiter and right now, my listeners can post jobs on ZipRecruiter for free by going to https://www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast
